Interface CommunicationAdapter

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game
public interface CommunicationAdapter

File: Communication.java Description: This file contains the communication adapter for the backgammon-specific events.

Method Summary
 void connected()
          Gets called when a connection is established
 void connectionRefused()
          Gets called when a connection fails to be established
 void disconnected()
          Gets called when a socket error occurs
 void receiveBar(Board currentBoard, int pointNum)
          Sends a blot to the bar, from the specified point.
 void receiveForfeitTurn()
           
 void receiveLose()
          Gets called when the player loses the game
 void receiveMessage(String message)
          Gets called when a text message is received
 void receiveMove(Board currentBoard, Player playerColor, int oldpos, int newpos, int rollValue)
          Gets called when a move is received.
 void receiveResetReq()
          Gets called when the other player clicks "New Game"
 void receiveResetResp(int resp)
          Gets called when the other player responds to "New Game"
 void receiveRolls(Board currentBoard, int i, int j)
          Gets called when dice rolls are received
 void turnFinished(Board currentBoard)
          Gets called when the other player's turn is over

receiveMove

void receiveMove(Board currentBoard,
                 Player playerColor,
                 int oldpos,
                 int newpos,
                 int rollValue)
Gets called when a move is received. The network player has moved, update the board. Apparently remote network player is always black?? (which explains why her moves are getting (25 - X)). Apparently oldpos value -1 meant coming in from bar, and 26 means bearing off?
